title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Project-Based Mathematical Practice Strategy Development for Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Concept Understanding and Fundamental Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collect three or more resources required for remote mathematics projects using Open Educational Resources (OER).
Learners can record/share audio-visual documentation of mathematical problem-solving processes using digital tools.
Learners can improve practical mathematics tasks at least once by incorporating peer feedback in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
